subject: Diving (Sports Event)
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Tom Daley, 18, has emerged as a diving prodigy in Britain in recent years, but many are looking for him to deliver in an event long dominated by China.
snippet: Tom Daley, 18, has emerged as a diving prodigy in Britain in recent years, but many are looking for him to deliver in an event long dominated by China.
